committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that when funds are made available through the American Heritage Trust or other sources for grants for historic preservation, a grant for the preservation of Quindaro, Kansas, should be given high priority.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the preservation of Quindaro, Kansas, should be given high priority when funds are available through the American Heritage Trust or other sources for grants for historical preservation.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that when funds are made available through the American Heritage Trust or other sources for grants for historic preservation, a grant for the preservation of Quindaro, Kansas, should be given high priority.
